dcterms:description: A widely used dataset in computer vision that contains images of common objects in various contexts, allowing for the study of gender artifacts in visual datasets.
dcterms:title: COCO (Common Objects in Context)

dcterms:description: A large-scale dataset that includes a diverse set of images with annotations, used to validate findings on gender artifacts in visual datasets.
dcterms:title: OpenImages
